title: Acupuncture
description: Acupuncture at the Duke Integrative Medicine Center can complement traditional treatments for a wide range of conditions, including cancer, osteoarthritis, insomnia, and fibromyalgia.
cleaned_text: Duke Integrative Medicine Center Acupuncture Announcements Face masks are optional at this location. Keeping everyone safe and well is our top priority.
